DOC.brief_summary: This study aim establish novel approach assist rational development analgesic anti-inflammatory drug . In first step test healthy human volunteer whether protein mediate inflammation pain detect experimentally induced inflammatory skin lesion . Fluids use detect protein collect inflamed skin site via small porous catheter . We wish establish expression pattern different protein correlate various test assess pain .
DOC.brief_title: A Human In-vivo Model Detection Inflammatory Nociceptive Biomarkers
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 2160 . 2 . Skin type II III accord classification Fitzpatrick ( II : fair skin , always burn , sometimes tan , III : medium skin , sometimes burn , always tan ) . & # xA ; 1 . History significant systemic disease , dermatological disease , bleed disorder , chronic pain . 2 . Consumption analgesic drug . 3 . Hypersensitivity sunlight .
